content:
The project automation, which reacts to people claiming issues, proposing PRs, etc., stopped working. I'm pretty sure it's because a token expired. I know how to make a new token (and I did) but then I think I have to use that token somewhere to restore the functionality, and I have no idea where.

@Pietro Monticone I guess you are the only person who can fix this. We should really build a project system that can still function when you are not available :)
In your repo settings, go to Security then Actions, and there should be something with a name like PAT_TOKEN in there; your new token should replace that (if I'm remembering correctly)
Thank you @Bhavik Mehta! Sorry for the inconvenience @Rémy Degenne.
